properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 v3 v4 v5 c2 v6 c3

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Will you drink with us Edric, Squire Edric, Squire Edric Will you drink with us Edric, Squire Edric my dear?

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: I cannot said Edric, said Edric, said Edric I cannot said Edric, I've had too much Beer

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: We drink to the Outlands, Squire Edric, Squire Edric, We drink to the Outlands, Will you drink with us now?

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: We drink to the King, etc...

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: We drink to the Queen, etc...

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: (Well Then!) We Drink To The Queens Brown Eyes, Squire Edric, Squire Edric, We Drink To The Queens Brown Eyes, WILL YOU DRINK WITH US NOW?

verse.name: c2
verse.lines: (Well, if I gotta....) I'll drink to the Queens Brown Eyes, said Edric, said Edric I'll drink to the Queens Brown Eyes, said Edric the dear

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: Don't drink so fast Edric, Squire Edric, Squire Edric, Don't drink so fast Edric, you've had too much beer

verse.name: c3
verse.lines: BLEEARRRGGGH, said Edric, said Edric, said Edric, BLEEARRRGGGH, said Edric, Squire Edric, Our Dear
